**Description**
---------------

The successful bidder will provide instructional design and development services for the Call Centres Design Team. The project aims to modernize the training material for current training programs in the Call Centre curricula, including migrating several eLearning courses from a Captivate format to the Adapt Authoring Tool format and producing/capturing audio recordings for the various Call Centre design team curricula.

**Key Requirements**
---------------------

* Provide all phases of the instructional design and development processes on an as-needed basis. Consultation with and approval of the client will be required.
* Meet with the client to discuss project requirements and timelines
* Provide various training materials to support the Call Centre curriculum
